entries.title: Drug maker paid for “news” story on CBS’s 60 Minutes, doctors’ group alleges
entries.description: The segment only had experts paid by the drug maker and didn't mention drug risks.

entries.title: Tesla made an annual profit of $12.6 billion in 2022
entries.description: High operating margins and good sales growth are responsible, Tesla says.

entries.title: Rocket Lab’s first US launch: Big for the company and the site
entries.description: The company's first launch from US soil was pretty—and pretty important.

entries.title: Poop on planes may help CDC probe international pathways of pathogens
entries.description: Wastewater testing has proven useful, and experts call for more sewage sampling.

entries.title: DirecTV dumps Newsmax instead of paying new fee, drawing Republican outrage
entries.description: DirecTV says Newsmax ratings aren't high enough to justify network's rate demand.

entries.title: Samsung’s new touch tech enables thinner, lighter OLED laptops
entries.description: Incorporating a design phones have used for over a decade.

entries.title: Stolen League of Legends source code being ransomed, and Riot Games won’t pay
entries.description: No player information or credentials were leaked in the attack, Riot Games says.

entries.title: General Motors is investigating small EV “party” trucks
entries.description: An electric competitor to the Ford Maverick might just happen.

entries.title: RNC sued Google for filtering spam but never used Gmail tool that bypasses filter
entries.description: Gmail pilot program for campaigns ends Jan. 31; Google will "evaluate next steps."

entries.title: After 25 years, GoldenEye 007 gets its first modern rerelease Friday
entries.description: Xbox gets enhanced 4K visuals, but Switch gets online play.

entries.title: 512GB version of the new MacBook Pro has a slower SSD than the Mac it replaces
entries.description: Apple is using fewer chips in M2 Macs to provide the same amount of storage.

entries.title: NASA will join a military program to develop nuclear thermal propulsion
entries.description: None of this will happen quickly. The technology is difficult and unproven.

entries.title: Apple beefs up smartphone services in “silent war” against Google
entries.description: Apple enhances maps, search, and online advertising on iOS to challenge rival Android.

entries.title: Manchin writes bill to stop temporary electric vehicle tax credits
entries.description: The senator wants his domestic minerals requirement implemented immediately.

entries.title: Researchers look a dinosaur in its remarkably preserved face
entries.description: Washed out to sea, a giant beast and its armored skin were left in pristine condition.
